description: Cover illustration for the paperback edition of the novel "Secret Mission: Cairo" (Award Books, New York, 1970), no. seven in the Secret Mission series, by Canadian author Donald Taylor Smith (1909-?).
inscription: Inscribed LR (outside image) on masking tape in graphite: HALL/#686400-A
markings: stamp on backing board: ALBERT SIRIANNI/ROOM1104 75 WEST 45 ST., N.Y. 36
medium: Gouache on paper, mounted on board
provenance: Ronald M. Koch; given to MIA, 1991.
title: Secret Mission: Cairo
